blog_content.share: Like it ? cost 0$ just share it :)
blog_content.aboutContent: A programmer and freelancer with one year of experience in front-end development. I have developed multiple previous projects where I worked on designing and developing user interfaces using the React framework. You can see my previous projects and the code that I have created.

projects.title: Projects I built :
projects.project1: This e-commerce store specializes in digital and physical products, allowing users to browse and purchase from various categories. It offers a modern, user-friendly design for a smooth and secure shopping experience.
projects.project2: A hospital informational website showcasing medical services, specialties, and appointment details, ensuring a comfortable healthcare experience.
projects.project3: A website specializing in web design and custom template development, including WordPress themes, offering monthly or yearly payment options.
projects.project5: A blog offering diverse articles on topics like technology, health, and education, aimed at enriching knowledge and providing valuable, engaging content for readers.
